Instructor.name: Eric Van Dusen
Instructor.blurb: Hi - I am a lecturer in Data Science as well as a staff member helping to build out Data Science Undergraduate Studies. I am passionate about how Data Science approaches can bring innovation to teaching and learning in all disciplines. I love trail running, kayaking, camping and exploring.

Course Staff.name: Alan Liang
Course Staff.blurb: Hi! My name is Alan, and I currently live in NYC. I co-created this course two years ago and still am somewhat involved. Before starting work, I completed my undergrad and masters at Cal, majoring in Economics and CS. I’m sort of from Shanghai, and I've taught Data 8 & ECON 140 in the past. Some things I enjoy include discovering good food, traveling, economics, and data science; guess which one is my favorite ;’) Hope you enjoy the course!

Course Staff.name: Matthew Yep
Course Staff.blurb: Hey my name is Matthew. I’m a fourth year studying economics and data science, and my hope is to apply what I’ve learned at Cal in the field of basketball analytics. I like to go fishing, watch the NBA, and feed ducks.

Course Staff.name: Rohan Jha
Course Staff.blurb: Hey everyone! I'm an undergrad double majoring in economics and data science at Cal. In my free time, I like hiking the Berkeley hills (shout out to anyone who's seen a sunset from the MSRI) and hanging out in my co-op! I'm looking forward to meeting everyone this semester!

Course Staff.name: Ergun Acikoz
Course Staff.blurb: Hello! I’m Ergun, from Istanbul Turkey. I’m a sophomore studying CS and ORMS. I used to play ice-hockey and I like geography!

Course Staff.name: Sreeja Apparaju
Course Staff.blurb: Hello! My name is Sreeja and I’m a junior studying Economics and Computer Science. I enjoy caffeinated drinks, board games and anything to do with food. I am really excited meet y’all this semester! (Please don’t forget to wear your face masks and stay safe!)

Course Staff.name: Vaidehi Bulusu
Course Staff.blurb: Hi! I’m Vaidehi, a sophomore studying economics and data science. I really enjoyed taking DATA 88E last semester (in spring 2021) and hope you enjoy it as well! This semester, I’m looking forward to helping students as a Connector Assistant. Feel free to reach out to me about any doubts you have or tips for doing well in the class.

Connector Assistants.name: Cole Ginter
Connector Assistants.blurb: Hi! My name is Cole. I am a junior studying Political Science and Economics. Academically I have a strong interest in microeconomic theory and political polarization. In my free time I love to travel, watch movies, and hike. I can’t wait to meet y’all this semester!

Connector Assistants.name: Hector Juarez-Vargas
Connector Assistants.blurb: Hey y'all! I'm Hector, a fourth year studying Data Science with a domain emphasis on Social Welfare, Health, and Poverty. In my free time I grow sunflowers, collect Pokemon cards, and lose it all in the stock market. I took Data88E in Spring 21, so feel free to ask any questions about the course; see y'all in office hours!

Connector Assistants.name: Miranda Li
Connector Assistants.blurb: Hi! My name is Miranda. I’m a senior majoring in economics and data science. In my free time, I enjoy snowboarding and hiking. Feel free to ask me any questions about the course. Looking forward to meeting y’all this semester!

Connector Assistants.name: Peter Flo Grinde-Hollevik
Connector Assistants.blurb: Hi! I'm Peter, a 2nd year double-majoring in Data Science and Environmental Economics and Policy. I'm passionate about finding new solution for a more sustainable future, and try spending my free time hiking or reading random books as often as I can.

Connector Assistants.name: Isabella Siu
Connector Assistants.blurb: Hey! I’m Isabella and I’m a second year pursuing Data Science with an emphasis on Economics. Outside of class, I enjoy taking photos for the Blue & Gold Yearbook and playing the piano. Feel free to ask me about the CS, Economics, and Data Science majors at Cal!

Connector Assistants.name: Yiyang Chen
Connector Assistants.blurb: Hey! I'm Yiyang, and I am a third year studying Economics and Computer Science at Berkeley. In my free time, I enjoy playing video games, watching movies, and cooking. I'm really excited to meet you all this semester! Feel free to ask me any questions about the course and the majors!
